arStrings.szText: A spate of grisly deaths terrifies a group of villagers who fear a dark power is at work.
A man in Zarbinzet claimed someone is killing villagers with demonic magic. He asked me to search the ruins outside of town for survivors.
Search for survivors at the Abandoned Ruins
I found a scene of fire and bloodshed in the ruins, just as the man described. I survived the demons, but a terrified girl emerged from her hiding place. I must make sure she is unharmed.
The young girl's name is Aneta, and once she learned I was not another demon, she begged me to help her finish her task to find flowers for her sick mother.
Aneta and I have found all the flowers she needed. Hopefully I can get her home before her mother worries.

Aneta got nothing but a scolding for her kind gesture towards her mother. When angry townsfolk accused her of horrible crimes, her mother did nothing! I must find Aneta and protect her from the angry mob!
Aneta is home safe, but her mother does not seem happy to see her...

Aneta got nothing but a scolding for her kind gesture towards her mother. When angry townsfolk accused her of horrible crimes, her mother did nothing! I must find Aneta and protect her from the angry mob!
